name: Number Link Fix Free App - bing globo Coloring Close5 Linker Puzzle Game
name_original: Number Link Fix Free App - bing globo Coloring Close5 Linker Puzzle Game
description:
NumberLinker is an addictive puzzle game that has 300+ free levels. Hints are available if you ever get stuck.
Connect matching colors with pipe to create a pair. Pair all numbers, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Features:
• 300+ free puzzles
• 5 different board sizes
• Totally FREE
• Try to enjoy the game using different devices.
